Classes/Flex/LayoutMode.html#/s:10FlexLa.name: fitContainer
Classes/Flex/LayoutMode.html#/s:10FlexLa.abstract: This is the default mode when no parameter is specified. Children are layouted inside the container’s size (width and height).

Classes/Flex/LayoutMode.html#/s:10FlexLa.name: adjustHeight
Classes/Flex/LayoutMode.html#/s:10FlexLa.abstract: In this mode, children are layouted using only the container’s width. The container’s height will be adjusted to fit the flexbox’s children

Classes/Flex/LayoutMode.html#/s:10FlexLa.name: adjustWidth
Classes/Flex/LayoutMode.html#/s:10FlexLa.abstract: In this mode, children are layouted using only the container’s height. The container’s width will be adjusted to fit the flexbox’s children

Classes/Flex/Position.html#/s:10FlexLayo.name: absolute
Classes/Flex/Position.html#/s:10FlexLayo.abstract: Positioned absolutely in regards to its container. The item is positionned using properties top, bottom, left, right, start, end.

Classes/Flex/Wrap.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A.name: noWrap
Classes/Flex/Wrap.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A.abstract: Default value. Specifies that the flexible items will not wrap

Classes/Flex/Wrap.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A.name: wrap
Classes/Flex/Wrap.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A.abstract: Specifies that the flexible items will wrap if necessary

Classes/Flex/Wrap.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A.name: wrapReverse
Classes/Flex/Wrap.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A.abstract: Specifies that the flexible items will wrap, if necessary, in reverse order

Classes/Flex/AlignSelf.html#/s:10FlexLay.name: auto
Classes/Flex/AlignSelf.html#/s:10FlexLay.abstract: Default. The element inherits its parent container’s align-items property, or stretch if it has no parent container

Classes/Flex/AlignSelf.html#/s:10FlexLay.name: stretch
Classes/Flex/AlignSelf.html#/s:10FlexLay.abstract: The element is positioned to fit the container

Classes/Flex/AlignSelf.html#/s:10FlexLay.name: start
Classes/Flex/AlignSelf.html#/s:10FlexLay.abstract: The element is positioned at the beginning of the container

Classes/Flex/AlignSelf.html#/s:10FlexLay.name: center
Classes/Flex/AlignSelf.html#/s:10FlexLay.abstract: The element is positioned at the center of the container

Classes/Flex/AlignSelf.html#/s:10FlexLay.name: end
Classes/Flex/AlignSelf.html#/s:10FlexLay.abstract: The element is positioned at the end of the container

Classes/Flex/AlignSelf.html#/s:10FlexLay.name: baseline
Classes/Flex/AlignSelf.html#/s:10FlexLay.abstract: The element is positioned at the baseline of the container

Classes/Flex/AlignItems.html#/s:10FlexLa.name: stretch
Classes/Flex/AlignItems.html#/s:10FlexLa.abstract: Default. Items are stretched to fit the container

Classes/Flex/AlignItems.html#/s:10FlexLa.name: start
Classes/Flex/AlignItems.html#/s:10FlexLa.abstract: Items are positioned at the beginning of the container

Classes/Flex/AlignItems.html#/s:10FlexLa.name: center
Classes/Flex/AlignItems.html#/s:10FlexLa.abstract: Items are positioned at the center of the container

Classes/Flex/AlignItems.html#/s:10FlexLa.name: end
Classes/Flex/AlignItems.html#/s:10FlexLa.abstract: Items are positioned at the end of the container

Classes/Flex/AlignItems.html#/s:10FlexLa.name: baseline
Classes/Flex/AlignItems.html#/s:10FlexLa.abstract: Items are positioned at the baseline of the container

Classes/Flex/AlignContent.html#/s:10Flex.name: stretch
Classes/Flex/AlignContent.html#/s:10Flex.abstract: Default value. Lines stretch to take up the remaining space

Classes/Flex/AlignContent.html#/s:10Flex.name: start
Classes/Flex/AlignContent.html#/s:10Flex.abstract: Lines are packed toward the start of the flex container

Classes/Flex/AlignContent.html#/s:10Flex.name: center
Classes/Flex/AlignContent.html#/s:10Flex.abstract: Lines are packed toward the center of the flex container

Classes/Flex/AlignContent.html#/s:10Flex.name: end
Classes/Flex/AlignContent.html#/s:10Flex.abstract: Lines are packed toward the end of the flex container

Classes/Flex/AlignContent.html#/s:10Flex.name: spaceBetween
Classes/Flex/AlignContent.html#/s:10Flex.abstract: Lines are evenly distributed in the flex container

Classes/Flex/AlignContent.html#/s:10Flex.name: spaceAround
Classes/Flex/AlignContent.html#/s:10Flex.abstract: Lines are evenly distributed in the flex container, with half-size spaces on either end Play it »

Classes/Flex/JustifyContent.html#/s:10Fl.name: start
Classes/Flex/JustifyContent.html#/s:10Fl.abstract: Default value. Items are positioned at the beginning of the container.

Classes/Flex/JustifyContent.html#/s:10Fl.name: center
Classes/Flex/JustifyContent.html#/s:10Fl.abstract: Items are positioned at the center of the container

Classes/Flex/JustifyContent.html#/s:10Fl.name: end
Classes/Flex/JustifyContent.html#/s:10Fl.abstract: Items are positioned at the end of the container

Classes/Flex/JustifyContent.html#/s:10Fl.name: spaceBetween
Classes/Flex/JustifyContent.html#/s:10Fl.abstract: Items are positioned with space between the lines

Classes/Flex/JustifyContent.html#/s:10Fl.name: spaceAround
Classes/Flex/JustifyContent.html#/s:10Fl.abstract: Items are positioned with space before, between, and after the lines

Classes/Flex/Direction.html#/s:10FlexLay.name: column
Classes/Flex/Direction.html#/s:10FlexLay.abstract: Default value. The flexible items are displayed vertically, as a column.

Classes/Flex/Direction.html#/s:10FlexLay.name: columnReverse
Classes/Flex/Direction.html#/s:10FlexLay.abstract: Same as column, but in reverse order

Classes/Flex/Direction.html#/s:10FlexLay.name: row
Classes/Flex/Direction.html#/s:10FlexLay.abstract: The flexible items are displayed horizontally, as a row.

Classes/Flex/Direction.html#/s:10FlexLay.name: rowReverse
Classes/Flex/Direction.html#/s:10FlexLay.abstract: Same as row, but in reverse order

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C13i.name: intrinsicSize
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C13i.abstract: Item natural size, considering only properties of the view itself. Independent of the item frame.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C7ad.name: addItem()
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C7ad.abstract: This method adds a flex item (UIView) to a flex container. Internally the methods adds the UIView has subviews and enables flexbox.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C7ad.name: addItem(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C7ad.abstract: This method is similar to addItem(: UIView) except that it also creates the flex item’s UIView. Internally the method creates an

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C6de.name: define(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C6de.abstract: This method is used to structure your code so that it matches the flexbox structure. The method has a closure parameter with a

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C6la.name: layout(mode:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C6la.abstract: The method layout the flex container’s children

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C012.name: isIncludedInLayout
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C012.abstract: This property controls dynamically if a flexbox’s UIView is included or not in the flexbox layouting. When a

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C012.name: isIncludedInLayout(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C012.abstract: This method controls dynamically if a flexbox’s UIView is included or not in the flexbox layouting. When a

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C9ma.name: markDirty()
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C9ma.abstract: The framework is so highly optimized, that flex item are layouted only when a flex property is changed and when flex container

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C12s.name: sizeThatFits(size:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C12s.abstract: Returns the item size when layouted in the specified frame size

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C9di.name: direction(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C9di.abstract: The direction property establishes the main-axis, thus defining the direction flex items are placed in the flex container.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C4wr.name: wrap(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C4wr.abstract: The wrap property controls whether the flex container is single-lined or multi-lined, and the direction of the cross-axis, which determines the direction in which the new lines are stacked in.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C15l.name: layoutDirection(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C15l.abstract: Direction defaults to Inherit on all nodes except the root which defaults to LTR. It is up to you to detect the

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C14j.name: justifyContent(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C14j.abstract: The justifyContent property defines the alignment along the main-axis of the current line of the flex container.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C10a.name: alignItems(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C10a.abstract: The alignItems property defines how flex items are laid out along the cross axis on the current line.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C9al.name: alignSelf(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C9al.abstract: The alignSelf property controls how a child aligns in the cross direction, overriding the alignItems

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C12a.name: alignContent(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C12a.abstract: The align-content property aligns a flex container’s lines within the flex container when there is extra space

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C4gr.name: grow(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C4gr.abstract: The grow property defines the ability for a flex item to grow if necessary. It accepts a unitless value

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C6sh.name: shrink(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C6sh.abstract: It specifies the flex shrink factor, which determines how much the flex item will shrink relative to the

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C5ba.name: basis(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C5ba.abstract: This property takes the same values as the width and height properties, and specifies the initial size of the

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C5wi.name: width(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C5wi.abstract: The value specifies the view’s width in pixels. The value must be non-negative.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C5wi.name: width(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C5wi.abstract: The value specifies the view’s width in percentage of its container width. The value must be non-negative.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C6he.name: height(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C6he.abstract: The value specifies the view’s height in pixels. The value must be non-negative.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C6he.name: height(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C6he.abstract: The value specifies the view’s height in percentage of its container height. The value must be non-negative.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C4si.name: size(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C4si.abstract: The value specifies view’s width and the height in pixels. Values must be non-negative.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C4si.name: size(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C4si.abstract: The value specifies the width and the height of the view in pixels, creating a square view. Values must be non-negative.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C8mi.name: minWidth(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C8mi.abstract: The value specifies the view’s minimum width in pixels. The value must be non-negative.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C8mi.name: minWidth(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C8mi.abstract: The value specifies the view’s minimum width in percentage of its container width. The value must be non-negative.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C8ma.name: maxWidth(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C8ma.abstract: The value specifies the view’s maximum width in pixels. The value must be non-negative.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C8ma.name: maxWidth(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C8ma.abstract: The value specifies the view’s maximum width in percentage of its container width. The value must be non-negative.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C9mi.name: minHeight(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C9mi.abstract: The value specifies the view’s minimum height in pixels. The value must be non-negative.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C9mi.name: minHeight(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C9mi.abstract: The value specifies the view’s minimum height in percentage of its container height. The value must be non-negative.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C9ma.name: maxHeight(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C9ma.abstract: The value specifies the view’s maximum height in pixels. The value must be non-negative.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C9ma.name: maxHeight(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C9ma.abstract: The value specifies the view’s maximum height in percentage of its container height. The value must be non-negative.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C11a.name: aspectRatio(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C11a.abstract: AspectRatio is a property introduced by Yoga that don’t exist in CSS. AspectRatio solves the problem of knowing

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C11a.name: aspectRatio(of:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C11a.abstract: AspectRatio is a property introduced by Yoga that don’t exist in CSS. AspectRatio solves the problem of knowing

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C8po.name: position(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C8po.abstract: The position property tells Flexbox how you want your item to be positioned within its parent.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C4le.name: left(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C4le.abstract: Set the left edge distance from the container left edge in pixels.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C3to.name: top(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C3to.abstract: Set the top edge distance from the container top edge in pixels.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C5ri.name: right(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C5ri.abstract: Set the right edge distance from the container right edge in pixels.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C6bo.name: bottom(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C6bo.abstract: Set the bottom edge distance from the container bottom edge in pixels.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C5st.name: start(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C5st.abstract: Set the start edge (LTR=left, RTL=right) distance from the container start edge in pixels.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C3en.name: end(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C3en.abstract: Set the end edge (LTR=right, RTL=left) distance from the container start edge in pixels.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C9ma.name: marginTop(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C9ma.abstract: Set the top margin. Top margin specify the offset the top edge of the item should have from from it’s closest sibling (item) or parent (container).

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C10m.name: marginLeft(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C10m.abstract: Set the left margin. Left margin specify the offset the left edge of the item should have from from it’s closest sibling (item) or parent (container).

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C12m.name: marginBottom(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C12m.abstract: Set the bottom margin. Bottom margin specify the offset the bottom edge of the item should have from from it’s closest sibling (item) or parent (container).

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C11m.name: marginRight(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C11m.abstract: Set the right margin. Right margin specify the offset the right edge of the item should have from from it’s closest sibling (item) or parent (container).

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C16m.name: marginHorizontal(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C16m.abstract: Set the left, right, start and end margins to the specified value.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C14m.name: marginVertical(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C14m.abstract: Set the top and bottom margins to the specified value.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C6ma.name: margin(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C6ma.abstract: Set all margins to the specified value.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C6ma.name: margin(_:_:_:_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C6ma.abstract: Set the individually top, left, bottom and right margins.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C10p.name: paddingTop(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C10p.abstract: Set the top padding. Top padding specify the offset children should have from the container’s top edge.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C11p.name: paddingLeft(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C11p.abstract: Set the left padding. Left padding specify the offset children should have from the container’s left edge.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C13p.name: paddingBottom(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C13p.abstract: Set the bottom padding. Bottom padding specify the offset children should have from the container’s bottom edge.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C12p.name: paddingRight(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C12p.abstract: Set the top padding. Top padding specify the offset children should have from the container’s top edge.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C17p.name: paddingHorizontal(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C17p.abstract: Set the left, right, start and end paddings to the specified value.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C15p.name: paddingVertical(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C15p.abstract: Set the top and bottom paddings to the specified value.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C7pa.name: padding(_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C7pa.abstract: Set all paddings to the specified value.

Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C7pa.name: padding(_:_:_:_:)
Classes/Flex.html#/s:10FlexLayout0A0C7pa.abstract: Set the individually top, left, bottom and right paddings.

Classes/Flex/LayoutMode.html.name: LayoutMode
Classes/Flex/LayoutMode.html.abstract: Defines how the layout(mode:) method layout its flex items.
